changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS reviews ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, body TEXT NULL CHECK(512 > LENGTH(body)), score INT NOT NULL CHECK(LENGTH(score) > 0, 10 > LENGTH(score)), created_at TIMESTAMPZ NOT NULL, good_id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL REFERENCES goods(id), user_id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id), );
